A4.text: In September 2007, McEntire's next studio disc was released titled Reba: Duets.

A5.text: In January 2018, McEntire won the Grammy Award for Best Roots Gospel Album.

A6.text: Reba: Duets topped the Billboard country chart and the Billboard 200.
